pr_title: [#2273] Add admin weak-subjectivity command for modifying and displaying state

timeline.message: Add admin weak-subjectivity command for modifying and displaying state

timeline.bodyText: Should we not return 1, in this case, showing that there was an error?
timeline.author: cemozerr

replies.bodyText: Hmm - good question.  I wasn't considering this an error ...
replies.author: mbaxter

replies.bodyText: I think 0 makes sense - say you have some script that clears this out, you wouldn't want it to error out just because the state was already empty.
replies.author: mbaxter
